name: Apple ProRes 422 LT
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Apple ProRes 422 LT, one of the more highly compressed Apple ProRes 422 codecs, is primarily geared for projects when digital storage space and data rate are limited.
